      • sendersToSearch

        public void sendersToSearch(@NonNull
                            java.util.List<Merchant> senders)
        If populated, only senders in this list will be searched for e-receipts. Note: This array must be a subset of the supported e-receipt senders, which can be found at https://ereceipts.blinkreceipt.com Default: nil
